about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Over 30 years of experience in distributing quality supplements and healthy food
about.companyStory: OSOGOVKA DOOEL is a private company founded in 1991 in Koƒçani. Over the years, the company has built a strong market position through long-term experience in distribution and sales of quality products.
about.distributionHistory: From our 2000 square meter warehouse in Koƒçani, for more than two decades we distributed over 3,000 items in the eastern part of Macedonia. For more than 20 years we have been successfully working with sales and delivery of supplements throughout the country, and since 2015 we are the official importer of the renowned brand Gold Touch Nutrition.
about.focusShift: Since 2020, the company has focused exclusively on supplement sales and in-house production of healthy food, developing our Real brand. Today, our mission is to offer carefully selected and quality products that support a healthy and active lifestyle.
about.commitment: With dedication to quality, trust and continuous development, OSOGOVKA DOOEL remains a reliable partner for all who choose health as a lifestyle.
about.fitBodyDescription: Since 2020, Fit Body has been activated as part of Osogovka.
about.fitBodySubdivision: Fit Body is a subdivision that produces the REAL brand (fitness and healthy food).
about.realRecipes: The recipes for Real produced by Fit Body are the work of nutritionists and fitness people and are therefore 100% natural and healthy.
about.goldTouchDescription: GRASS FED COWS - Gold Touch Nutrition is the first company to use milk from grass-fed, hormone-free cows to produce proteins that are organic, healthy and actually good for your body and health.
about.certificatesDescription: Unique with all possible certificates ISO 22000, GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices), HACCP, EFSA (European Food Safety Authority).
about.zoranQuote: The food we eat plays a vital role in how we look and feel. Regular exercise is important, but according to research, nutrition has the greatest impact on our appearance, health and fitness.
about.naceAchievements:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our products? Want to become a partner? Contact us and we will respond as soon as possible.
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully! We will respond soon.
contact.errorMessage: An error occurred while sending. Please try again.
contact.faqQuestion1: How can I become a partner?
contact.faqAnswer1: Contact us by phone or email and we will give you detailed information about the conditions for becoming a partner.
contact.faqQuestion2: Do you have a physical store?
contact.faqAnswer2: We currently work online, but you can contact us to arrange a meeting in Koƒçani.
contact.faqAnswer3: Delivery is done by cargo service and usually takes 1-3 working days depending on location.
contact.faqAnswer4: Yes, you have the right to return within 14 days from the date of receipt, provided the product is not opened.
